docs.title: Home
docs.text: WSO2 Integrator: WebSubHub is a WebSub compliant hub implementation built on  Ballerina. It enables organizations to adopt event-driven architectures by supporting publish-subscribe communication over HTTP(S).  WebSubHub can be configured with the message broker of your choice as its persistence layer, making it ideal for scalable, real-time event distribution across services, applications, and systems.
